scripts.dev: concurrently "cd common && yarn build:watch" "cd data && yarn build:watch" "cd data && yarn dev" "cd web && yarn dev"
scripts.lint:check: concurrently "cd common && yarn lint:check" "cd data && yarn lint:check" "cd web && yarn lint:check"
scripts.lint:fix: concurrently "cd common && yarn lint:fix" "cd data && yarn lint:fix" "cd web && yarn lint:fix"
scripts.test: concurrently "cd common && yarn test" "cd data && yarn test" "cd web && yarn test"
scripts.test:cov: concurrently "cd common && yarn test:cov" "cd data && yarn test:cov" "cd web && yarn test:cov"

hooks.pre-commit: cd common && lint-staged && cd ../data && lint-staged && cd ../web && lint-staged
